verses.name: Hebrews 10:25
verses.text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together, as the manner of some is; but exhorting one another: and so much the more, as ye see the day approaching.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:26
verses.text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth, there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins,

verses.name: Hebrews 10:27
verses.text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation, which shall devour the adversaries.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:28
verses.text: He that despised Moses’ law died without mercy under two or three witnesses:
